mapper.select: select a.*, b.custName, c.soppTitle, d.userName, concat(left(a.schedFrom,10),'T',substring(a.schedFrom,12,9)) sTime, CONCAT(left(a.schedTo,10),'T',substring(a.schedTo,12,9)) eTime from swc_sched a left join swc_cust b on a.custNo=b.custNo left join swc_sopp c on a.soppNo=c.soppNo left join swc_user d on a.userNo=d.userNo where a.schedNo=#{schedNo}
mapper.delete: update swc_sched set attrib='XXXXX' where schedNo=#{schedNo}
